summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, discussing a person who is supposed to be covering for Epstein. The email emphasizes confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege, indicating the sensitive nature of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, seeking information about someone who is supposed to be covering for him.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein, indicating a level of trust and communication between them.

connections.description: Epstein is reaching out to Staley for assistance, suggesting a personal or professional relationship.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is seeking information about someone who is supposed to be covering for him.
The email contains a confidentiality notice, indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
The communication is marked as confidential and intended only for the recipient.
There is a mention of unauthorized use or disclosure being prohibited.
